Thanks for the link! Very interesting. I went to Edison's place down here in
Florida in search of any information on the subject.I found nothing. It was
rumored that the executors of the estate had anything of the sort removed.
I lost both my grandad and an uncle last month. People change their minds
about the afterlife. I've seen it first hand!
How old was Edison when this article was written?
Thanks
Dave
